Desde entonces, hemos seguido viviendo y entrenando juntos en la familia Chou como hermanos. Sin embargo, el tiempo ha traído la vorágine de la guerra. La guerra contra la raza extranjera comienza... \"¡¿Has visto la habilidad con la espada del joven maestro?!\" \"¡¿Y sus flechas nunca fallan el blanco?! Haré uso de mi vida pasada como maestro de artes marciales y, junto a Hakurei, ¡¡seremos incomparables mientras logramos grandes cosas!! ¡¡Comienza la fantasía de la espada entre el héroe reencarnado y la bella joven guerrera!!","ja":"時は戦乱。\n\n隻影(セキエイ)は幼いころ、帝国北方の辺境を守る張家のご令嬢・白玲(ハクレイ)に死の淵から救われた。以降、張家で兄妹のように暮らしてきたのだが、彼には命の恩人にも言えないことがあった。――隻影は、転生してきた1000年前の不敗の英雄だったのだ！"},"links":{"amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B0CXQXH7LS","ap":"sousei-no-tenken-tsukai","bw":"series/456448/list","cdj":"https://www.cdjapan.co.jp/product/NEOBK-2945970","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/811459/","mal":"162732","mu":"7iwxhtf","raw":"https://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_FS06204325010000_68/"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"0bc90acb-ccc1-44ca-a34a-b9f3a73259d0","name":{"en":"Reincarnation"}},{"id":"33771934-028e-4cb3-8744-691e866a923e","name":{"en":"Historical"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"ac72833b-c4e9-4878-b9db-6c8a4a99444a","name":{"en":"Military"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}}]}

1ba2acfb-3f10-46f4-acef-eebd652d7eda:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"1ba2acfb-3f10-46f4-acef-eebd652d7eda","title":{"en":"Osewa Yakimasu"},"altTitles":[{"en":"The Perfect Wife"},{"ja":"お世話やきます"}],"lastChapter":"6","availableTranslatedLanguages":["en"],"description":{"en":"1-2) The Perfect Wife  \nTeshima could never resist his adorable kouhai Yuuichi; he always ended up buying him things and lending him money. Yuuichi moved away a year ago, but now he's back and Teshima's just happy to spend time with him again. But are they picking up right where they left off? Can Yuuichi really be that dense?  \n  \n3) Sweet Pain  \nIslander Mihama spends most of his time alone, so when klutzy vacationer Kunitsu stumbles into his life, Mihama doesn't expect much from him. Kunitsu's kind nature draws him in, but vacation's always have to end…  \n  \n4-5) Love and Smile  \nIntense Kuramochi and push-over Kao are unlikely friends and roommates. Like many others in his village of Solta, he believes it to be a cursed mark - and with good reason. In one swoop, his family was assassinated and his childhood friend disappeared, feared dead. Years down the road, he embarks on a revenge-driven journey to join the Solta army.\n\nBut he's not alone. Big Master needs customers for blood (and Hansoo’s blood asap); Small Master needs a link to the human world, and any way to aggravate Big Master (read: Hansoo); and Hansoo needs to keep away from Big Master long enough to stay in the church until she can afford her own place. The year is 2045, when MRI technology was still in its nascent stages.  \n  \nA decade ago Maki's parents were killed in a fire, and since then he's been living with his legal guardian Sawamura Satoshi, who suffered severe burns while rescuing him. Though he's convinced that his parents were murdered, Maki has no clues to help him find the culprits other than the hazy memory of a certain symbol.   \n  \nUpon discovering that this symbol is associated with a powerful secret society called Premium that's based in Tokyo University, Maki enters the same college, hoping his top credentials will get him an invitation to Premium. He isn't chosen, but the more socially adept Suzuki is. Maki approaches Suzuki in hopes that he'll lend him his aid, and the two embark on a hunt for the truth."},"links":{"al":"77513","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/gp/product/B074CDXQ91","ap":"himitsu-season-0","bw":"series/68635/list","kt":"4739","mal":"47513","mu":"103360"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shoujo","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"3b60b75c-a2d7-4860-ab56-05f391bb889c","name":{"en":"Psychological"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"ee968100-4191-4968-93d3-f82d72be7e46","name":{"en":"Mystery"}}]}

1c1b4df7-784e-49d6-9184-87e45c5bd8e5:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"1c1b4df7-784e-49d6-9184-87e45c5bd8e5","title":{"en":"Poet was Not Built in a Day"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"詩人は一日にして成らず"},{"ja-ro":"Shijin wa Ichinichi ni Shite Narazu"}],"lastChapter":"6","availableTranslatedLanguages":["en"],"description":{"en":"A young man comes to Tokyo to become a poet (he actually composes a lot through the book!). But one can not support himself with poetry, so the hero works for a half-legal firm running all possible errands. In the process he meets a lot of people, both men and women, who are strangely interested not in his rhymes, but in his …body! Absolutely lovely tragicomedy.  \n~by DaRyu  \n  \nAida Rendou, ex-student and would-be poet, struggles to earn a living in the big city. As a talent scout for the adult video firm, M+ Productions, he hunts for potential actresses but it's not enough to pay the rent. So boss Nanazuka offers him extra cash to use his body to seduce men and women alike. For 15 years, Michiru has been modeling for Taisen's works, living only for him. Mas, depois de acabar no inferno sem conseguir conquistar nada, o Imperador YeomRa retorna Noh HyungJin no tempo… “Devo pelo menor dar poder suficiente para que ele possa se proteger.” O que é esse ‘poder’ que foi dado para ele pelo Imperador YeomRa? В борьбе со злом в лице высшей власти Южной Корее, пытаясь вернуть справедливость в свою страну, он был безжалостно убит агентами национального агентства разведки.\n\n“Он не должен был умирать…” Но Хёнджин был возвращен императором Ёмра, чтобы очистить коррупцию на Земле, вернув его назад во времени и дав некую силу. Что же за силу ему даровал император? Сможет ли Но Хёнджин изменить как своё будущее, так и всей Южной Кореи?!\n\n---\n- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/74662)"},"links":{"al":"133648","ap":"this-is-the-law","kt":"igeosi-beobida","mal":"155755","mu":"180632","raw":"https://page.kakao.com/content/56854672"},"originalLanguage":"ko","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"292e862b-2d17-4062-90a2-0356caa4ae27","name":{"en":"Time Travel"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"3e2b8dae-350e-4ab8-a8ce-016e844b9f0d","name":{"en":"Long Strip"}},{"id":"5ca48985-9a9d-4bd8-be29-80dc0303db72","name":{"en":"Crime"}},{"id":"85daba54-a71c-4554-8a28-9901a8b0afad","name":{"en":"Mafia"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"da2d50ca-3018-4cc0-ac7a-6b7d472a29ea","name":{"en":"Delinquents"}},{"id":"e197df38-d0e7-43b5-9b09-2842d0c326dd","name":{"en":"Web Comic"}},{"id":"eabc5b4c-6aff-42f3-b657-3e90cbd00b75","name":{"en":"Supernatural"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}},{"id":"f5ba408b-0e7a-484d-8d49-4e9125ac96de","name":{"en":"Full Color"}}]}

1ce69005-8f67-45e0-8cac-bc0690e1bfbf:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"1ce69005-8f67-45e0-8cac-bc0690e1bfbf","title":{"en":"Yokubou to Koi no Meguri"},"altTitles":[{"en":"The Cycle of Base Desire and Higher Love"},{"en":"欲望と恋のめぐり"},{"en":"欲望恋情"},{"en":"욕망과 사랑의 굴레"}],"lastChapter":"17.3","availableTranslatedLanguages":["en"],"relatedIdds":["0208bdf7-a048-46d4-8c93-39d794f0d587"],"description":{"en":"A series of non-linear and interrelated stories filled with bishies and angst!  \n  \nHoujou Academy is a private school, isolated from the rest of the world and attended by the heirs of rich and noble bloodlines. ENG. - The 4 Days of the Dead), 1996 - The paratroopers are made up of a small number of elite, brave soldiers who invade deep into the enemy's territory and attack mainly by surprise.\n If they survive, they are brave, but if they make a mistake, they are exposed defenseless to the enemy forces and killed without being able to fight back. Forty paratroopers descend into enemy territory where Nazi soldiers are waiting for them, and most of them are killed. The fate of a young soldier hanging from a tower in the midst of enemy forces!\n\n- Volume 2 - [The Escape of Adolf](https://www.mangaupdates.com/series/fuga1d4/seikan) (アドルフの脱出, Adolf no Dasshu, ALT. JAPN. - 生還 , Seikan, ALT. ENG. - Still Alive), 2003 - Berlin, the German capital, one week before Hitler's death. The city is devastated by Allied air strikes, and Soviet ground troops are closing in. \nLieutenant Suzuki, a Japanese officer called \"Gaijin\" dispatched by the Japanese government, is taken into custody by the Gestapo, the Nazi secret police, on suspicion of robbing antiques and slaying three guards with a Japanese sword... \nA war manga by a master mangaka!\n\n- Volume 3 - **The 5/14 Rebellion** (反乱5・14, Hanran 5 .14) - A man takes a sightseeing bus to the village of Sanroku, called a phantom village near Lake Mashu in Hokkaido, and sees all the people around him killed by the machine gun of a tank that suddenly appears. \nHe is then pursued by a terrifying group of people who are plotting to establish an independent Hokkaido. The man manages to escape back to Tokyo and comes back to Hokkaido with his friends to find out the truth...\n\n- Volume 4 - **Shiden Kai**  (紫電改,) - A POW camp was set up on an isolated island in the South Sea where a U.S. Air Force airfield was located. Flight Sergeant Funada, who is interned there, was thinking of escaping by plane. One day, he finally carries out his escape plan using a Shiden Kai captured by the U.S. military... \nIn addition to the title story, the collection also includes tales of other famous aircraft such as the Hien, Gekko, and Naryu.\n\n- Volume 5 - **Bloody Sunday** (血の日曜日, Chi no Nichiyobi) - Hawaii around 1941, when the population of Japanese Americans was said to be 100,000 and most of them were poor except for a few successful ones. A young boy named Raida spent his days skipping school and earning money from smuggled goods. \nOn December 7, 1941, Japanese fighter planes launched a surprise attack on Pearl Harbor in Hawaii, leading to the outbreak of war between Japan and the United States. Six months passed, and the boys of Japanese descent living in Hawaii became the Second Gen Corps...\n\n- Volume 6 - **A Diffused Reflection** (乱反射, Ranhansha) - In a small town in South America, a bar is abuzz with excitement over the World Cup and the Brazilian team is on the attack. \nThe bar is infiltrated by an assassin who is targeting the ambassador. 1d3d4a56-24f0-46de-9ea4-9b2daa278acd:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"1d3d4a56-24f0-46de-9ea4-9b2daa278acd","title":{"en":"Paper Fortress"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"紙の砦"},{"ja-ro":"Kami no Toride"},{"es":"La Fortaleza de Papel"}],"lastChapter":"7","availableTranslatedLanguages":["en"],"relatedIdds":["7b10b51b-dc23-492d-a913-4b099d657b4d"],"description":{"en":"A collection of one-shots done during the 1970s, all regarding some aspect of Tezuka's early life. Includes a reflection of his time at the famous Tokiwa-so.\n\n- **Record of the Life of Gachaboy** (がちゃぼい一代記, Gachaboy Ichidaiki, ALT. ENG. - The God of Manga): A reflection on Tezuka's career up to that point. Tezuka  encounters the God of Manga right after the war, who nicknames Tezuka \"Gachaboy\". He is determined to see Tezuka become a great mangaka, no matter what - and restore manga's presence in Japan.\n- **Paper Fortress** (紙の砦, Kami no Toride):  Right at the end of the war, Tezuka is doing manga in private in high school. He meets a girl who fully understands his situation, and they get along well. In a society where manga, dancing, and even informal relationships are forbidden, how will Tezuka, crazy about manga, keep on?\n- **Hungry Blues** (すきっ腹のブルース, Sukippara no Blues): Directly following *Paper Fortress*, Tezuka is now a hungry, desperate student with little luck on his path in manga. Things change when he comes across a young lady who works for a newspaper, and he manages to land a serial for it. However,  in an era rife with turmoil and starvation, Tezuka's own stomach may prove to be a serious intrusion in not just his manga-making career, but his very life.\n- **Tokiwa-so Monogatari** (トキワ荘物語, ENG. - The Tale of Tokiwa-so): Part of a series recounting memories within the famous apartment complex, Tezuka showcases its history through commentary from the building itself!\n- **The Letter that Came** (という手紙がきた, Toiu Tegami ga Kita): Tezuka receives an ominous letter that may put him in hot water.\n- **Animal Tsurezuregusa** (動物つれづれ草, Doubutsu Tsurezuregusa): Two reflections on animals Tezuka had encountered in his early years - the first a horse, the second two tanuki.\n\nAn excerpt of *Dotsuitare* featuring Tezuka is also included at the end. This excerpt is a compilation of scenes/segments of Tezuka's scenes.\n\n---\n- **Animal Tsurezuregusa won the 21st Bungeishunju Manga Award in 1975, along with Tezuka's, very famous, Buddha**\n\n---\n**Volume 274 of the Osamu Tezuka Complete Works**","es":"(amazon.es):\n\nFinales de 1944, la Segunda Guerra Mundial aún no llegaba a su fin y las fuerzas norteamericanas empezaron una serie de intensos bombardeos contra las ciudades más grandes de Japón como Osaka, donde se llegaron a contar cerca de 10 000 civiles muertos. Tezuka tenía 16 años, él junto a sus compañeros fueron movilizados a Osaka para trabajar en un arsenal del ejército japonés.\n\nEn esos años, el dios del manga era constantemente reprendido por sus superiores, pues se la pasaba dibujando cómics en lugar de hacer su trabajo y un día su castigo consistió en subir a la torre de vigilancia para avisar si veía a los bombarderos B-29 de los Estados Unidos. No obstante, cuando empezó la alarma del ataque aéreo, no tuvo tiempo de bajar quedando expuesto en una de las edificaciones más altas de la fábrica. Entonces, una bomba cayó en el techo a dos metros de él y Tezuka cayó gritando de lo alto de la torre, pero milagrosamente logró sobrevivir. El futuro mangaka describe que el suelo y las casas de los alrededores estaban en llamas y del cielo caía una lluvia de hollín. En medio del caos, el chico decidió subir a la ribera del río Yodogawa y pudo apreciar los enormes cráteres donde habían caído las bombas y los cuerpos calcinados que se podían distinguir unos encima de los otros.\n\nEsta terrible experiencia junto con otras más son recogidas en la obra autobiográfica de Tezuka Osamu, Kami no Toride (Paper Fortess), publicada entre 1970 y 1977, una década clave para el discurso crítico a la guerra en el manga. Por esos años, según Jean Marie Bouissou, muchos autores de la generación del también animador japonés, crearon obras en las que mostraban su decepción ante los adultos qué habían decidido llevar a su país a un estado bélico y albergaban esperanzas en la juventud que podía cambiar el futuro. Tetsuwan Atomu del mismo Tezuka es un ejemplo de esta corriente y de la profunda importancia para el mangaka de los temas de la defensa de la paz y la condena a la guerra."},"links":{"al":"123453","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/-/en/%E6%89%8B%E5%A1%9A%E6%B2%BB%E8%99%AB-ebook/dp/B011BAO80U/ref=tmm_kin_swatch_0?_encoding=UTF8\u0026qid=1652672121\u0026sr=8-3","ap":"kami-no-toride","bw":"de01db040f-50c3-4b5f-8f42-385caf7522f3","cdj":"https://www.cdjapan.co.jp/product/NEOBK-797943","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/100434/","kt":"kami-no-toride","mal":"92966","mu":"66702"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"0234a31e-a729-4e28-9d6a-3f87c4966b9e","name":{"en":"Oneshot"}},{"id":"07251805-a27e-4d59-b488-f0bfbec15168","name":{"en":"Thriller"}},{"id":"0a39b5a1-b235-4886-a747-1d05d216532d","name":{"en":"Award One's the nerdy class rep with a closet perverted streak, and the other's a haughty, superficial underachiever with a very short fuse.  \nOne day, Mizuno ropes Yanagida into being her practice dummy for giving head. Yanagida reluctantly goes along with her – until she admits she's only doing this for the sake of her would-be boyfriend: the captain of the soccer team, Takeda. Deeply offended, Yanagida snaps and forces himself on Mizuno. Naturally, she doesn't take this very well, but after Yanagida picks a fight with Takeda when he overhears him badmouthing her behind her back, she starts to see Yanagida in a different light.\n\n| Namespace | Tags |\n| :- | :- |\n|MALE| glasses, schoolboy uniform |\n|FEMALE| anal, big breasts, chinese dress, defloration, kimono, paizuri, **rape**, schoolgirl uniform, swimsuit, twintails, underwater, waitress |\n|OTHER| multi-work series, story arc, tankoubon, uncensored |"},"links":{"al":"44551","kt":"24942","mal":"14551","mu":"38665"},"originalLanguage":"ja","contentRating":"pornographic","tags":[{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"97893a4c-12af-4dac-b6be-0dffb353568e","name":{"en":"Sexual Violence"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}}]}

A second life she hadn't wanted. She had already enjoyed everything in her previous life, and had tried everything she had wanted to try. If she has to be reborn, it's just annoying and boring no matter what she does. In the meantime, Prince Caesar visits the duchy to avoid a power struggle, and Helena, who recognizes Caesar's talent, decides to become his swordsmanship teacher.\n\n\"I'll make you an Emperor.\"\n\nIt was just something I started thinking about, using the skills of my previous life to train future students and liven up my boring life. But even if you like me, don't you think you like me a bit too much?\n\n---\nDante Lenatous, who'd become the Empress Regent in her past life. Five hundred years later, she's reborn as the youngest daughter of a duchy?\n\nI have already achieved everything I wanted in my past life and done everything I'd wanted, so no matter what I do in this unwanted second round of life, it's annoying and boring.\n\nSince I was reborn anyway, I'd been thinking of teaching young students, but... my disciples love me too much. Was I this talented at teaching?\n\n\"If it's for you, Teacher, I can even lead this world to ruin!\"\n\nAll I'd done was discovered Prince Caesar's talent, so why is he acting like that?!\n\nThe teaching of young students by the Max-Level Princess who has no regrets or lingering feelings towards life--!\n\n---\nI was an illegitimate daughter abandoned by the promiscuous emperor. From there, I ended up on the street where I learned that I had a knack for the sword. I competed in tournaments, became a mercenary, and I made a name for myself. Just when I had become the talk of the empire, the emperor wanted me back. In return, I demanded to be next in line for the throne. After years of hard work, I finally became empress and died happily. But here I am, alive again. Ugh, can’t a girl be left alone? This time, I’m going to be as lazy as I please!\n\n---\n[Original Novel](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=52334485)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** Max Level hercegnő ma is unatkozik, mint Dante Renatus, aki korábbi életében császár volt. Ötszáz évvel később egy hercegség legfiatalabb lányaként születik újjá? Már mindent elértem, amit szerettem volna az előző életemben, és mindent megtettem, amit akartam, szóval nem számít, mit csinálok életemnek ebben a nem kívánt második körében. Ez bosszantó és unalmas. Amúgy újjászületésem óta arra gondoltam, hogy fiatal diákokat tanítok, de... a tanítványaim túlságosan szeretnek. Ilyen tehetséges voltam a tanításban? – Ha érted, tanár úr, akár tönkretehetem ezt a világot! Csak annyit tettem, hogy felismertem Caesar herceg tehetségét, akkor miért viselkedsz így? Amikor már a birodalomban rólam beszéltek, a császár visszahívott. Cserébe követeltem, hogy én lehessek a következő a trónörökös. прошлой жизни она насладилась всем, чем хотела, и попробовала всё, что только могла попробовать.После перерождения, что бы она ни делала, любая вещь ей быстро надоедала и казалась скучной.Однако в тот момент ради решения вопроса о власти в герцогство приезжает принц Кайсар. Хелена, рассмотревшая в нём талант, решила стать его учителем фехтования.«Я сделаю тебя императором».Всё это началось из-за желания разукрасить свою жизнь с помощью попыток взрастить подопечного...«Ради мастера я уничтожу весь этот мир».Но отчего-то мне кажется, что я не просто понравилась своему ученику, а прямо запала в его душу.\n\n---\n[Original Novel](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=52334485)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%A7%8C%EB%A0%99-%EA%B3%B5%EB%85%80%EB%8A%94-%EC%98%A4%EB%8A%98%EB%8F%84-%EB%AC%B4%EB%A3%8C%ED%95%98%EB%8B%A4/2751), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home/58873967)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://tapas.io/series/the-dukes-bored-daughter-is-my-master/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://pdt.tencentac.com/?adtag=appshare.ios.detail%26QQ%26241\u0026contentId=241\u0026platform=IA)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E6%BB%BF%E7%AD%89%E5%8D%83%E9%87%91%E5%A5%BD%E5%8E%AD%E4%B8%96/302)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Tuan-Putri-Jagoan-Sedang-Bosan-Hari-Ini/115)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/103342)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%8A%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%95%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%B5%E0%B9%88%E0%B9%84%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%82%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B5%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%B8%E0%B8%94%E0%B9%81%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%87/402)","uk":"Данте Ренатус, котра в минулому житті посіла почесне місце імператриці завдяки своїй майстерності фехтування, через 500 років переродилась «Хеленою» - донькою герцога Перески.\n\n«Навіщо мені друге життя? Я насолоджувалась тими благами, які мала у попередньому, і спробувала все, чого тільки бажала моя душа. Все те, чим я займаюсь зараз здається мені неймовірно нудним.»\n\nТа в той момент її резиденцію відвідує принц Цезар, задля уникнення боротьби за владу. Герцогиня визнала його талант, приймаючи рішення стати його вчителькою фехтування.\n\n«Я зроблю тебе імператором.»\n\nЦе було лише спробою урізноманітнити її марудне життя. Герцогиня мала намір використати навички її минулого життя задля виховання учнів.\n\n«Заради вас, наставнице, я можу знищити весь світ.»\n\n«Щось мені підказує, що я надто сильно подобаюсь своєму учневі.»\n\n---\n[Original Novel](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=52334485)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** With great looks and a gifted environment, it seemed like she was on the right track to fulfill her dream, but she soon found herself faced with a seemingly insurmountable wall when her height stopped growing at 158cm (5'2\"), hopelessly too short to be a professional model.  \n  \nAlthough Chiyuki still kept on believing in herself for years despite everyone telling her it's impossible, Chiyuki's resolve starts to crumble as she enters her last year of high school. This is when she meets Tsumura Ikuto, a lame classmate with a surprising talent for designing clothes, who is also considering giving up his dream due to unfortunate circumstances. Eccentric Lover  \nPisarz - Risa, którego hobby jest seks i jego edytor-okularnik - Sakaki. Czasami zainteresowania mogą być bardziej niebezpieczne niż się zdaje. Czy nasz pisarz zostanie uratowany? Co się stanie z edytorem, gdy ściągnie okulary?  \n  \n7. Return Man  \nPrzyjaciele z dzieciństwa, Kensuke i Naoki spotykają się ponownie po trzynastu latach rozłąki. After finding his sports bag, he assumes he was on a school trip. With only seven days worth of food, he eventually decides to make a boat to leave the island. He thought he was alone on the island until finding a girl named Imaise Chika eating his food. They then decide to continue carving the boat together. Since the boat only has room for one, Yamada decides to set off for help, but returns upon noticing that not only has Imaise put her share of rations in his bag, they are mostly untouched as well. After returning, he notices she made the oar out of a fishing lance and he decides they can live on the island longer.","pt":"Yamada é um náufrago em uma ilha sem nenhum navio passando por perto e ele não consegue lembrar por que ele está lá. Depois de encontrar sua mochila de esportes, ele assume que ele estava em uma viagem escolar. Com apenas 7 dias de comida, ele eventualmente decide fazer um barco para sair da ilha. Ele pensava que estava sozinho na ilha até encontrar uma garota chamada Imaise Chika comendo sua comida. Eles então decidem continuar construindo o barco juntos.
